definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: Exactly schoolmate youth, in full flower, the direction landscape, encourages the writing.
sentences.chinese: 恰同學少年，風華正茂，指點江山，激揚文字。

sentences.english: Yellow paper, have you in the summer's handwriting.
sentences.chinese: 泛黃的紙張上，有着你當年那風華正茂的筆跡。

sentences.english: Disease cut Smith off in the best part of life.
sentences.chinese: 病魔使風華正茂的史密斯英年早逝。

sentences.english: Physical activity is for people in the "prime of life".
sentences.chinese: 身體活動是“風華正茂”的青壯年人的事。

definition: old but vigorous (idiom); hale and hearty despite the years
things change with the passage of time (idiom)
magnificent style unmatched in his generation (idiom); peerless talent
born at the wrong time (idiom); unlucky (esp. to complain about one's fate)/born under an unlucky star/ahead of his time
a white steed flits past a crack (idiom); How time flies!
to talk idly about important matters (idiom)/to set the world to rights/to pass judgment on everything
ready to start on sth/about to act
less capable than desirable (idiom); not as strong as one would wish/the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak
